high_descs: Turn left and walk forward, turning left again and approaching the wooden desk
Pick up the right most clear bowl from the desk
Turn left and walk to the lamp just left of the desk
anns.task_desc: Examine the bowl under light from the lamp

high_descs: Turn left, walk to the bookcase, then turn left again and walk up to the desk.
Pick up the bowl that is to the right of the other bowl on the desk.
Move over to the small table that is to the left of the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine a bowl using the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Make two lefts to cross the room and head to the desk.
Pick up the clear container on the right of another clear container on top of the desk.
Walk to the lamp that is next to the desk.
Turn on the lamp that is on the smaller desk.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a clear container, turn on a lamp.
